twitter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a bird twitters, it makes a lot of short high sounds
twitter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to talk about unimportant and silly things, usually very quickly and nervously in a high voice
twitter.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to send a short message using the social networking service Twitter
twitter.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the short high sounds that birds make
twitter.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a social networking service on the Internet which allows mini-blogging (=sending short text messages to other users)
